document_data.name: House Lurian
document_data.mainbody: '''House Lurian''' was a noble family of the city of [[Procampur]] in [[the Vast]]. They were an ancient and highly respected house famed for their talented goldsmiths.{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|9}}{{Cite web/House Lurian}}
document_data.Activities: The Lurian goldsmiths were reputed to be able to design and craft any item of the specified weight, size, and shape to perfection and with intricate detail. In their designs for various utensils and other items fashioned from [[gold]] or [[silver]], the Lurians were without peer.{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|8}}
document_data.Base of Operations: They had a house in the [[Nobles District]] of the city.{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|4}}
document_data.History: House Lurian was established in the {{YearlinkName|810}} and were well-respected for the next few centuries, thanks to their diligent work for the other noble families of the region.
document_data.Members:
